title: Area Calculator â€“ fast area of rectangles, triangles, circles & more

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1. Rectangle / Square Formula: \( A = w \times h \) Where: \( w \) = width, \( h \) = height

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 2. Triangle Formula: \( A = \frac{b \times h}{2} \) Where: \( b \) = base, \( h \) = height

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 3. Circle Formula: \( A = \pi r^2 \) Where: \( r \) = radius

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 4. Trapezoid Formula: \( A = \frac{(a + b) \times h}{2} \) Where: \( a \) and \( b \) are the parallel sides, \( h \) is the height.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 5. Parallelogram Formula: \( A = b \times h \) Where: \( b \) = base, \( h \) = perpendicular height

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 6. Ellipse Formula: \( A = \pi a b \) Where: \( a \) = semi-major axis, \( b \) = semi-minor axis
